I am a Computer Science and Math double major at Amherst College.

My primary areas of interest are Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Science. In my free time, I develop web apps and improve my technical chops as a programmer. Other things I enjoy doing: reading, jogging, and pretending to be Legolas from LOTR sometimes.

Thanks for stopping by.
